title: Rebrand app as “Josh” (title, header branding, logo) and set deployment subdomain to josh

requirements.text: Update all user-visible branding text from “Threads” to “Josh”, including the top-left header brand text and any other remaining “Threads” references in the UI.

quotes: subdomain should only be josh instead of josh-ulx. Also the title is still threads, use Josh instead of threads and use an appropriate logo for josh

acceptanceCriteria: Header brand text in the sticky top header shows “Josh” (no longer “Threads”).
A scan of the frontend UI and templates shows no remaining user-facing “Threads” branding (except where part of a descriptive non-brand sentence is intentionally kept, if any).

requirements.text: Change the HTML document title to use “Josh” instead of the current Threads-based title text so that the browser tab/title reflects the new app name.

quotes: Also the title is still threads, use Josh instead of threads

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/index.html` `<title>` is updated to include “Josh” and does not include “Threads”.
After loading the app, the browser tab title shows “Josh”.

requirements.text: Add an appropriate “Josh” logo and update the app header branding to use it (replacing the current generated app logo asset usage where shown in the header).

quotes: use an appropriate logo for josh

acceptanceCriteria: A new generated logo image for Josh exists under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and is used by the header brand link.
The header logo has appropriate alt text (e.g., “Josh logo”).
The previous logo asset is no longer referenced in the header component.

requirements.text: Update the production deployment configuration so the app subdomain is exactly `josh` (not `josh-ulx`).

quotes: subdomain should only be josh instead of josh-ulx

acceptanceCriteria: The deployed app is reachable via the `josh` subdomain, and `josh-ulx` is no longer the active subdomain for this app.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.

Do not edit files under `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`, or anything under `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose existing UI components instead).
Keep the backend as a single Motoko actor; only introduce `backend/migration.mo` if state upgrade is required (not expected for pure branding changes).
nonGoals: Do not change the social app feature set (feeds, posting, likes, follows, replies, reposts) beyond branding/title/subdomain adjustments.
Do not introduce third-party authentication providers or external services to manage domains/subdomains.

required: Minimalist “Josh” logo mark, clean modern style, high contrast, on transparent background (josh-logo.dim_512x512.png)
edits: Replace the existing logo artwork with a Josh-appropriate logo (app-logo.dim_512x512.png > josh-logo.dim_512x512.png)
